name: Minefaire: Official MINECRAFT Community Event (Charlotte, NC)(Exhibition)
content: Minefaire: Official MINECRAFT Community Event at the Park Expo and Conference Center July 13-14, 2019\. MINECRAFT Players and Their Families Unite at Minefaire to: Meet MINECRAFT YouTube Celebrities Compete in tournaments and build battles Participate in the famed costume contest Witness live stage shows Learn from Official MINECRAFT Developers and MINECRAFT Education Global Mentors Shop at the World's Largest Official MINECRAFT Merch Store Score Minefaire event exclusives Solve your way out of the MINECRAFT Escape Room Experience MINECRAFT with Acer VR Mixed Reality Headsets Show off your creativity in the LEGO building zones and more! Children 2 and under are free URLs: Tickets: https://go.evvnt.com/404558-0?pid=4868 Facebook: https://go.evvnt.com/404558-2?pid=4868 Prices: Enchanted Pass - Saturday 7/13/2019 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM: USD 95.69 Diamond Pass - Saturday 7/13/2019 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM: USD 75.09 Gold Pass - Saturday 7/13/2019 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM: USD 52.34 Afternoon Pass - Saturday 7/13/2019 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM: USD 42.04 Enchanted Pass - Sunday 7/14/2019 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM: USD 95.69 Diamond Pass - Sunday 7/14/2019 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM: USD 75.09 Gold Pass - Sunday 7/14/2019 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM: USD 52.34 Afternoon Pass - Sunday 7/14/2019 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM: USD 42.04 Time: 10:00 am - 5:00 pm Venue details: The Park Expo and Conference Center, 800 Briar Creek Rd, Charlotte, NC 28205, USA
